greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of eta(q^3)^10 / (eta(q) * eta(q^9))^3 in powers of q.
comment: Cubic AGM theta functions: a(q) (see A004016), b(q) (A005928), c(q) (A005882).
reference: B. C. Berndt, Ramanujan's Notebooks Part III, Springer-Verlag, see p. 475 Entry 7(i).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
B. C. Berndt, S. H. Chan, Z.-G. Liu and H. Yesilyurt, A new identity for (q;q)10 [inf] with an application to Ramanujan's partition congruence modulo 11, Quart. J. of Math., 55 (2004), pp. 13-30.
J. M. Borwein and P. B. Borwein, A cubic counterpart of Jacobi's identity and the AGM, Trans. Amer. Math. Soc., 323 (1991), no. 2, 691-701. MR1010408 (91e:33012).
formula: a(n) = 3 * b(n) where b(n) is multiplicative and b(3^e) = 1 + 3*(e>0), b(p^e) = (p^(e+1) - 1) / (p - 1) otherwise.
G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2), A(x^4)) where f(u, v, w) = u^2*w + 4*u*w^2 + v^3 - 6*u*v*w.
Expansion of b(q^3)^3 / b(q) = c(q)^3 / (9*c(q^3)) = (a(q)^2 + 3*a(q^3)^2) / 4 = (a(q)^2 + a(q)*b(q) + b(q)^2) / 3 in powers of q where a(), b(), c() are cubic AGM theta functions.
G.f. is a period 1 Fourier series which satisfies f(-1 / (9 t)) = 9 (t/i)^2 f(t) where q = exp(2 Pi i t). - _Michael Somos_, Aug 25 2014
mathematica: CoefficientList[ Series[1 + Sum[k(3x^k/(1 - x^k) - 27x^(9k)/(1 - x^(9k))), {k, 1, 60}], {x, 0, 60}], x] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 14 2004 *)
a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, Boole[ n == 0], 3 Sum[ If[ Mod[ d, 9] > 0, d, 0], {d, Divisors @ n }]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 25 2014 *)
a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ QPochhammer[ q^3]^10 / (QPochhammer[ q] QPochhammer[ q^9])^3, {q, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 25 2014 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, n==0, 3 * sigma(n) - if( n%9==0, 27 * sigma(n/9)))};
(PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^3 + A)^10 / (eta(x + A) * eta(x^9 + A))^3, n))};
(MAGMA) A := Basis( ModularForms( Gamma0(9), 2), 61); A[1] + 3*A[2] + 9*A[3]; /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 25 2014 */
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jul 06 2004
